title: Suggest a new jungler to main
body: Since riot butchered Gragas's mechanics with this upcoming update, I now have no go to jungler anymore, so can you please suggest someone else to try? Preferably with a similar skill cap and floor (easy to learn hard to master). Thanks!

replies.body: Sejuani is somewhat similar to Gragas, so you might enjoy her.

The only real problem I have with her is that there's not that much you can do with her kit, for example with gragas's kit you used to be able to r people into q. She's easy to learn, but not hard to master.
I can suggest Zac, but how is Gragas butchered?

{{champion:11}} 
Easy to learn, hard to master ;)
Cowsep is a Master Yi main. He's gotten to Master Teir ON THE KOREAN server with Master Yi.
https://youtu.be/pf9yJM4bbQw

And he teaches viewers how to Yi too
https://youtu.be/Nbo2TWWr8dM
